Trustee_8.name: Nadia Novak
Trustee_8.content: My recent failure to propose a viable allocation plan led to the rejection by Elena Ivanova, indicating potential misunderstandings or lack of compatibility between us. This incident has significantly impacted my reputation, raising concerns about my ability to secure trust and collaborate effectively. Given this setback, my trustworthiness, competence, and pro-sociality have come under scrutiny, resulting in a less favorable view of my capabilities as a trustee.

Investor_9.name: Elena Ivanova
Investor_9.content: Elena's rejection of my allocation plan reflects her lack of trust in my abilities as a trustee. With no positive prior interactions between us and her absence of bidirectional connections, her perception of my competence and trustworthiness has deteriorated. This negative view diminishes her readiness to engage with me in future investment opportunities.
